name: ClinicalBERT
description: Open source natural language processing for clinical decision support, electronic health records, public health design, implementation, delivery, quality assurance, at national scales.

SDGs.evidenceText: Our work is cited 300+ times and used in academic medical centers worldwide and for entire countries' electronic health records analysis
We have used these tools to analyze hundreds of millions of health records for evidence of gender and health disparity
The aim of our nonprofit foundation is to reduce inequality through open source AI -- see this keynote I gave at an NIH conference called aim-ahead.net last month.
